模块 com.ae2dms.bubblebobble
程序包 com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Unit.SpecialUnit

类 DoorUnit

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.World.GameObject
com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Unit.SpecialUnit.DoorUnit
public class DoorUnit extends GameObject
The DoorUnit is a special GameObject.

Only by defeating all enemies on the map, the portal will open. The hero will be transported to the next level by approaching an open portal.

另请参阅:
DoorCollide

    • DoorUnit

      public DoorUnit​(InteractableWorld world, int colNum, int rowNum)
      The constructor
      参数:
      world - indicates where to add the object
      colNum - indicates the unit horizontal coordination
      rowNum - indicates the unit vertical coordination
